segments.text: I glance into this cozy kitchen and notice the woman busily drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a dress, looking so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink right in front of her is overflowing with water gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the edge onto the floor, making a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already standing in that water, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, there's a boy climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable, tilted like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, reaching up with her hand open for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a peaceful garden outside, all tidy and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's daytime, with sunlight streaming in, highlighting the whole scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't turned around or heard the water running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are being sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR
